extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Details

    • fetchAllProposals

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> fetchAllProposals​(java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      A method to get a slice of all the proposals in the database between give start and end dates
      Parameters:
      startDate - :the start date from which proposals are shown
      endDate - :the end date till which the proposals are shown
      pageable - : A pageable type variable to show the proposals in a continuous stream
      Returns:
      a slice of all proposals between the given start and end date

    • getDefault

      public java.util.List<Proposal> getDefault​(Team team, java.util.Date start, java.util.Date end, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      This is the default view on the landing page. I shows the teams proposals by the given start and end date
      Parameters:
      team - : Team id
      start - :the start date from which proposals are shown
      end - :the end date till which the proposals are shown
      pageable - : A pageable type variable to show the proposals in a continuous stream
      Returns:
      a list of all proposals marked to the team between the given start and end date

    • fetchUserProposals

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> fetchUserProposals​(java.lang.Long id, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      It shows all of user proposals by the given start and end date
      Parameters:
      id - :the user id
      startDate - :the start date from which proposals are shown
      endDate - :the end date till which the proposals are shown
      pageable - : A pageable type variable to show the proposals in a continuous stream
      Returns:
      a slice of all user proposals between the given start and end date
